attributes.action: Driving tests to still go ahead during lockdown.
attributes.additional_details:
I think this should be allowed as I get in a cab to & from work everyday with one other person. It would be much safer for me to take a test for 40 minutes with one other person than to be in a taxi everyday.
If you can sit in a taxi with one other person then why can’t you do a driving test with one other person?
attributes.background: I would like driving tests to still go forward.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Exempt driving tests and lessons from COVID-19 restrictions
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
